allow:
Bash(git commit --no-verify -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive testing plan document

Document testing gaps across the codebase with prioritized work items:
- Critical: hexray-core, SSA construction, structurer \(phases 1-3\)
- High: dataflow passes, signatures, error paths \(phases 4-6\)
- Medium: parsing, output formats, integration \(phases 7-9\)

Identifies 360-540 new tests needed with specific test names and estimates.
EOF
\)")
